mapper.select: SELECT ro.`enddate`,po.confirm_status as confirmStatus,po.`confirm_img`,po.`pname`,SUM(pod.`peoplecnt`) AS peoplecnt,SUM(pod.`unit_price`) AS unitPrice,SUM(pod.`amount`) AS amount,ro.`order_no` as orderNo,pod.`pid`,po.`runing_no` as runingNo FROM route_order ro LEFT JOIN product_order po ON ro.`order_no` = po.`order_no` LEFT JOIN product_order_detail pod ON po.`pid`=pod.`pid` where ro.`order_no`=#{orderNo}

SELECT po.`order_no` as orderNo,pod.`price_item` as priceItem,po.`pid`,po.`ptype`,pod.`peoplecnt`,pod.`unit_price` as unitPrice ,pod.`amount`,po.`runing_no` as runingNo FROM product_order po LEFT JOIN product_order_detail pod ON po.`pid` = pod.`pid` AND po.`order_no` = pod.`order_no` WHERE po.`order_no`=#{orderNo} AND po.`pid`=#{pid}
SELECT c.* ,b.cus_no as cusNo,b.type,b.id as bid,b.imgPath FROM book_cus_info b LEFT JOIN customer c ON b.`cus_no` = c.`id` WHERE b.`order_no`=#{orderNo} ORDER BY b.`type` DESC

SELECT ro.`enddate`,po.`pname`,po.confirm_status as confirmStatus,po.`confirm_img` AS confirmImg ,SUM(pod.`peoplecnt`) AS peoplecnt,SUM(pod.`unit_price`) AS unitPrice,SUM(pod.`amount`) AS amount,ro.`order_no` AS orderNo,pod.`pid`,po.`runing_no` as runingNo FROM product_order po LEFT JOIN route_order ro ON ro.`order_no` = po.`order_no` LEFT JOIN product_order_detail pod ON po.`pid`=pod.`pid` WHERE po.`supplier_no`=#{supplierId} AND po.`order_no`=#{orderNo} AND po.pid=#{pid}
